com.ouihop.ouisdk.interactor

Class DriverTripInteractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ouihop.ouisdk.interactor.BaseInteractor<DriverTripInteractor.InteractorObserver>
      • com.ouihop.ouisdk.interactor.DriverTripInteractor

  • public class DriverTripInteractor
extends BaseInteractor<DriverTripInteractor.InteractorObserver>
    Author:
    Michael ibrahim this interactor's functions are - starting and ending trips - execute driver's actions like canceling trip - handle route changing - notify observers with trip changes
